resume_markdown:
# Darwhin Gomez

Darwhin88@gmail.com | 347-491-2955 | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | New York, New York

## Professional Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with extensive experience in designing and implementing scalable software solutions using Python and modern architectural patterns. Proven track record in optimizing performance and contributing to cutting-edge technologies, including machine learning and vector databases. Adept at building automated data pipelines and enhancing application throughput, resulting in significant efficiency gains. Committed to shaping the future of software development through innovative problem-solving and collaboration.

## Education
**Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning**  
City University of New York – School of Professional Studies  
Expected Jan 2026  
GPA: 4.0, Dean’s List (2x)  

**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  
Jun 2024  
GPA: 3.78, Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

## Core Skills
- **Programming Languages:** Python (pandas, scikit-learn, PyTorch), SQL, R, Java, JavaScript, HTML, C#, PHP  
- **Cloud Technologies:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight, Bedrock, SageMaker), Azure  
- **Data Management:** ETL/ELT (Glue, SSIS), Data Modeling, SQL/NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB)  
- **Machine Learning:** Generative AI (LLMs, fine-tuning), Statistical Analysis, Algorithms, Data Structures  
- **Software Development:** Agile/Scrum, CI/CD, Microservices Architecture, APIs (REST, FastAPI)  
- **Security:** SIEM, IDS, Active Directory, Linux  

## Experience
**Solutions Architect Intern**  
Amazon Web Services (AWS), Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed secure, scalable AWS reference architectures for enterprise customers.  
- Built POCs combining Bedrock LLMs with Athena/Glue/Lambda analytics for actionable insights.  
- Automated a sentiment-analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records, enhancing feedback loops by 5x.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by ~5% and reducing toxicity by ~8%.  

**Software Developer Intern**  
WOPLLI Technologies, Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Developed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured Azure cloud environments for application hosting and deployment.  
- Managed API integration and testing scripts using Postman.  

**IT Support Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services, New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts, reducing manual workload.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access and maintained IT asset inventory using ServiceNow.  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY & Generation USA, Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons covering IT support and scripting for 200+ learners, achieving a 96% graduation rate.  
- Developed testing materials and tracked student engagement using a custom database.  

## Projects
**Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant**  
- Developed a FastAPI + OpenAI GPT-4 Mini system for automating resume and cover-letter generation.  
- Integrated job-board APIs for sourcing opportunities, reducing application time by 60%.  

## Certifications
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate  

## Interests
- AI Ethics and Responsible AI, NYHackR R-based community, Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers, Science Fiction Literature, Chess, Basketball, Poker
